objective: Working on a SAAS-based ecommerce platform, specifically developing a white label customer mobile app. Successfully converted a React Native app to Flutter with comprehensive feature implementation, ensuring all missing functionalities were properly integrated and optimized for cross-platform performance.

Developed comprehensive real estate buying and selling applications with advanced features including socket-based messaging, audio and video calling capabilities for seamless communication between users. Built a news portal mobile app supporting both user and reporter functionalities, enabling content creation, publishing, and consumption with real-time updates and interactive features.

Collaborated with design teams to translate mockups into functional and user-friendly app interfaces. Successfully integrated Google Maps and background location tracking features for real-time location awareness, including risk warning functionalities based on user reviews. Implemented chat functionality using sockets to enable real-time communication and enhance user engagement within the platform.
